sentences.sentence: We finally got a computer with Internet, and my mother and I put it by the window (dad's outta the picture again).
sentences.translation: 我们终于有了电脑，能上网了。 母亲和我把电脑放在窗旁（我又没有父亲了）。

sentences.sentence: Muttering dire predictions about “nothin’ good comin’ outta this, ” Delno hitched his chin toward the TV.
sentences.translation: 德尔诺喃喃地说完“来者不善”的可怕预言后，就抬起下巴对着电视。

sentences.sentence: He added: "Complete and utter choas on the streets.".. no power... my heart is beating outta my chest!... tsunami warning!
sentences.translation: 他补充：“街道上完全彻底的混乱…没有电力.” .我的心击打我的胸！
